## Code Cell

Here is a Python code cell.

Install the VS Code Python Extension to enable
running this cell interactively.

```{python}
import osmnx as ox
```

```{python}
gdf_boundary = ox.geocode_to_gdf("borneo").dropna(axis=1, how="any").to_crs("EPSG:4326")
```


```{python}
gdf_boundary.to_file('data/borneo_boundary.shp', driver='ESRI Shapefile')
```
